FuncDef:
The anycast-rp command configures an anycast-rendezvous point (Anycast-RP) and displays the IPv6 Anycast-RP view or displays an existing IPv6 Anycast-RP view.
The undo anycast-rp command deletes an Anycast-RP. The anycast-rp command configures an anycast-rendezvous point (Anycast-RP) and displays the IPv6 Anycast-RP view or displays an existing IPv6 Anycast-RP view. The undo anycast-rp command deletes an Anycast-RP. By default, no Anycast-RP is configured. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an Anycast-RP address.
The value is in hexadecimal notation. This address must be a valid IPv6 unicast address
